title: The Art Of Warfare
overview: Kodamazha Suni, a retired organised crime leader, is compelled to return to his homeland after his former gang is attacked by an unknown adversary. Haunted by his past decisions, Suni's journey mirrors the battles of ancient warriors, as he faces his greatest adversary yet. As the conflict deepens, Suniâ€™s thought process is explored through the wisdom of an ancient Chinese text, revealing the timeless struggle between strategy, surveillance, and survival
